data.Name: PAX JAPONICA GROOVE
data.Bio: Pax Japonica Groove is a project by house musician 黒坂修平 (Kurosaka Shuhei) which began for the purpose of helping promote world peace by means of unlocking the natural, harmonious spirit of Japan. Pax Japonica Groove's live sets can include up to ten different domestic and international musicians and collaborators on stage, while their performances focus on crossing genre boundaries, expression of the mind and body, and giving emotional excitement to their audience. Read more on Last.fm
